name: Mark Smith
text: We eat at the Houston (Spring) Mellow Mushroom all the time and wanted to try this one when we were passing through Tempe. ‚Ä¶More

name: Jada Cox
text: The food here was pretty good. I tried to get something outside of my usually choice which is pepperoni pizza, so this time I ordered the Pacific Rim pizza with a red sauce base, mozzarella, ham, bacon, caramelized onions, pineapple, and ‚Ä¶More

name: Bryce Nance
text: This is one of my very favorite places to eat. Their other locations are amazing as well! The food is very good,, I'm one if those people who usually orders the same thing at restaurants, but here I've been able to order something new ‚Ä¶More

name: jade milnes
text: The stone baked pizzas are really good here and if you like beer they have a lot of options. I recommend the mighty meat pizza it has five different types of meat on it and is so crunchy and delicious.

name: Jazmin Mascorro
text:
The best happy hour on Mill. PERIOD

1/2 Off Beers and Munchies from 3p-6p and daily drink specials. üçª ‚Ä¶More

name: Eric Hernandez
text: Great place to go and watch t.v. and dine. Nice and clean. Brilliant menus

name: Xavier Willis
text: The mushroom is perfect for a quick bite, a craft beer, and skill sharpening amongst fun people, young to old. Dot at the bar, a table, or the patio looking out to Mill Ave! The craft pizzas are phenomenal and completely customizable. They also offer salads, calzones, and burgers, among other items. Very fun and worth returning!

name: Ashley H
text: Like it says in the name, it's a mellow place. Nice chill vibe, good place to go when you want to relax and sip your beer. I recommend the pear cider if you want something sweet.

name: mike fissel
text: This rating is for the Mesa location.  Will NEVER go back to Mesa again even though it is close to where I live.    Walking up and getting your name on the list is a waste of time.  We were told no tables or booths were available.   We ‚Ä¶More

name: sue e
text: I love Mellow mushroom put this location is very bad comparing to the other two locations. Drinks were bad food took too long and was cold when served!

name: Chris Casias
text: Waitress (I forgot her name, starts with an A) recommended a few drinks and food. All great. Ordered the wings on my own but was not impressed. Everything about my visit, much like all prior visits I've had, was great!

name: Dana Darr
text: Totally dead for dine in but the service was great and the food was just as good as last time we ate at Mellow Mushroom. We really appreciate you being open and giving us great service. Thank you to the people that were working tonight!

name: Jaynie Beauchamp
text: Love their pizza, especially the crust! Flavored very well. Great service too. Like Tempe location better than Ahwatukee. For some reason the food tastes better. I have been to both locations multiple times, but not the Ahwatukee one in a couple years.

name: Matha Parks
text: Ok service. Pizza & Calzone pretty tasty.

name: desiree murillo
text: pizza, yeah, so fresh. i'll return with my relatives.

name: Ryan Kelley
text: Decent pizza. Large portions. Decent beer selection when the kegs aren‚Äôt blown. 3 were out when there last. Happy hour and reverse happy hour are great.

name: Marc Williams
text: A fun and trendy place for drinks a d food after work. Try the hand made pretzels wit beir cheese üç∫üßÄü•®=ü§§  üòä

name: Ricardo Alvarado
text: I actually was upset with the price and I talked to the manager he actually was kind enough to explain that there pizza is high quality ingredients I went ate the pizza with my family and to be honest it was amazing that is some high quality ingredients pizza

name: MICHAEL A DICARLO
text: One of the best places for pizza, great location and atmosphere and just when you think it couldnt be any better we got Emma as our server. First time at this Mellow Mushroom but she made us feel like regulars.with that being said if you're ‚Ä¶More

name: Alfredo Carroll
text: This place is worth a visit. They have large portions for fair prices. Consistently neat and with excellent ambience. Will visit here again.

name: Liz R
text: For those who are curious this is a dine in type of pizza shop with a fine dining restaurant set up

name: M SP
text: This place can be extremely loud.  The waiters are very nice and great at job.  Great attitude. Food choice is so so.  But not bad.

name: Michael Prindle
text: Great food with an excellent vibe. Server was a little slow but overall it was a nice experience.

name: Cecile Vane
text: I love Mellow Mushroom! They have the BEST Moscow mules. Awesome environment, and friendly staff. I enjoyed a couple drinks with some friends and had some great food which tasted pretty good. The pizza looked awesome (I didn‚Äôt order it) and the brownie was DELICIOUS

name: Nikolay Kolev
text: Not a bad place. Nothing spectacular, nothing really bad either. I would eat here again.

name: Mike Mendez
text: Wings are delicious and pizza is also great. Lots of originality, great drink selection!

name: Craig Lewis
text: The young lady here is very attentive to patrons.

name: Susan Cook
text: In a college town, this is a great place for pizza, calzones and pasta.  We had side salads (which were a nice size) and a medium pizza.  We were full when we walked out.  Dave was our server and provided excellent service.

name: R G
text: Huge beer selection! Really good pizza.

name: Andy Gutierrez
text: Good food good people hella good drank

name: Joshua Llodrat
text: Delicious as always! I wish we had a Mellow Mushroom in NYC. Our waitress was very nice and accommodating! The pizza, pesto cheesy bread and pretzels were so yummy, fresh and came out quickly. My partner and I almost ate at a taco spot down ‚Ä¶More

name: Russel H
text: As always: it was delicious, good service, customizable food plates based on preference, polite servers, and they wear masks and gloves all the time! 5 stars ALL THE WAY!

name: Lee Lyric
text: If you're not allergic to corn then this place would be great,  but I had trouble finding something safe for me to eat. I had a very nice waitress who was willing to check on what's got corn in it. Sad when I go to a pizza place and I can ‚Ä¶More

name: Kat Koehn
text: So, biggest complaint... if you're going to brag about your house-made sauce, mean it. Real, handmade pizza sauce doesn't have corn syrup in it. I got lucky, I could eat most of the menu, but my partner was stuck with salads. There's no ‚Ä¶More

name: yvonne perez
text: Happy hour quickie visit! 1 drink!! Had a pineapple cider!! Yum!! Taste like Tepache that I make!! Check them out!! 50% off apps and almost all beers!!

name: Diana Oduho
text: Yesterday was my first time trying Mellow Mushroom and it was absolutely amazing! The food was so good! Wonderful atmosphere and pizza was some of the best I‚Äôve had in a long time. Brice our server went above and beyond to make our first experience enjoyable. I‚Äôll definitely be back!

name: Jeremy Bridges
text: Very professional staff, hostess and server were both fantastic.

name: M Z
text: Updating my review after visiting this place one year ago. This time much better food and service. House pizza is amazing, loads of toppings. Our server is super nice. I‚Äôm glad we had a much better experience than last time. ‚Ä¶More

name: Serena Hintz
text: Great services! Waiter was attentive and kind. Food was yummy.

name: Jade Fire
text: Brice has been an amazing waiter and turned my day from poop, to an awesome end to a day. This was my first time here at the Mellow Mushroom, and they did not disappoint. I love the atmosphere, music, and food. Thank you Brice!

name: Ryan McCoy
text: The food was good, the drinks were good, our server was excellent!

name: Thomas Berumen
text: Over priced pizza that isn't very good...... The crust was terrible.

name: Shaun Allen
text: My wife and I sat too close to other patrons when the whole restaurant was avail. Friendly service

name: Kevin Washburn
text: Good gluten free dough for pizzas. No burgers though. Went on Saturday night. Food was good and well prepared. Too many people to keep on even for last night. .man

name: Jim Kennedy
text: Always a great stop. Pricey for the portions they offer & drinks are above average price for wells. Staff is polite however, more robotic than personable. Food tends to take longer than usual full staffed places. Having said that, the food was Amazing and the orders were right. Hadn‚Äôt really planned on dinner being 2 hours.

name: Joseph Cerrillo
text: You guys never disappoint. The 3 locations I've been to are consistent with quality and taste. Love the variety of beer, and the baked wings are bomb digaty!

name: Daniel Fieldstone
text: This Mellow Mushroom has been here for a very long time!  These pizza places are all decorated differently on the inside but still offer a great brand.  Laid back environments that have food that can be on the healthy side in a funky, cool place.

name: Rakesh R
text: The Mushroom Garlic Pizza was fantastic

name: Jacob Oliveira
text: Just go there it's awesome.

name: Blane Robinson
text: This was some of the best pizza I've ever had. Julia, my server was great, vivacious and friendly. And they have my favorite local craft beer. Loved it.

name: Zack Whitethorne
text: Always a great experience with very good food and a wide variety of beer selections.

name: Ashley Smith
text: Food was not good at all.

name: Maria M
text: I'd strongly recommend buying the groupon at Mellos Mushroom. You can use it for anything! I posted pictures of the delicious food I ordered!

name: Sam A
text: I stumbled upon this place while walking down mill ave in Tempe 3 weeks ago. The happy hour prices were great. 50% off most drinks! I also ordered some wings that were surprisingly really good but were small. Staff were for the most part attentive. I'll definitely return for happy hour

name: Christopher Ragsdale
text: I was in a training class and everyone was talking about this place. Well when there's smoke there's fire. Loved it!

name: Courtney Schinner
text: Great pizza and cocktails.

name: Bill Knowlton
text: My former law office was located just off of Mill Avenue, and the Mellow Mushroom always hit the spot.  Really good food, great service, and reasonably priced.

name: Brendan Bogolin
text: Great food and great beers! The lights are a bit bright for a bar, but still one of the best places on mill.

name: Shelley Oldridge
text: Since once again Google you are following me around, I had an awesome time at Mellow Mushroom. The food was great. We were pressed for time and they accommodated us. Great staff.

name: patricia espinoza
text: Our order was very good .Pizza wings and other appetizers everthing was worth having. Great staff .

name: Brian Heskett
text: The service was great. Food was good. It was fun to watch the pizza makers throwing the dough in the air.

name: Meee Lll
text: Delicious food, good portions, friendly atmosphere.

name: Az Photography
text: My go to place for quality pizza. Good atmosphere and service everytime I go. The Kosmic Karma is delicious!

name: John Runyan
text: Medium Pacific Rim pizza! Coors light for baby and Voodoo Ranger Starship IPA for me! Greatness!

name: Julio Macias
text: We arrived at a great time they had happy hour at night on a Saturday.  Had a huge order of  pretzels with parmesan and the hot wings. Both very good. Service was great but too noisy for us old people. Went to ASU Gammage to see the Carole King Musical. Great night date with the wife :)

name: M C
text: Good pizza

name: Mr. Rat
text: Not worth it.  I used to love coming here. The service was fantastic, the food was always great, and no matter how crazy the guests got, the environment was addicting. ‚Ä¶More

text: I think I can die in peace knowing that I've tried their pretzel bites. Mellow mushroom is the best kind of mushroom and not just because the vibe is good, but because they got pretzel bites and pizza ‚Ä¶More

name: Chris LaBounty
text: Took a group here for a business appreciate dinner. It was pretty difficult to carry on a conversation, but that was ok. The tap list was amazing, the vibe was very relaxed, and the pizza was fantastic.

name: M.L. Hinkle
text: As always the food was excellent. As for the service......let's just say that the skinny young guy with tats on his forearm working at the bar, needs to learn to help all customers, not just regulars that he knows. During the 45 minutes ‚Ä¶More

name: Kendra C
text: Loooove mellow! I've been to this one at all hours of the day&service is always good. Great beer selection yummy pizza. Their pizza crust is soo good. I don't always eat my crusts but I do at mellow :)

name: Natlie Rook
text: I really enjoyed the quick and timely service me and my family received. The hostess and the server were right on the ball. Normally when I go out other places the people act like they don't want to be at that job so they are not there for ‚Ä¶More

name: Juan Hickman
text: When our first choice for pizza was closed for an employee party, we decided to try Mellow Mushroom. It was conveniently located about 2 blocks from our hotel, only another 1/2 block further than the closed shop. While the hostess was ‚Ä¶More

name: Carol McCamy
text: Excellent pizza!

name: David Garcia
text: The food and the costumer service is a perfect 5 stars the price is a 5 stars but the have the music way to loud I have a family member from out State and we couldn't have a nice talk I hope they can bring the music a little bit low. But I love this place

name: Star P
text: It was our first time there.  The house special is really good.

name: brian icedo
text: If you want an earthy feel and taste, come here ! The cheese, tomato sauce and pesto sauce taste earthy and delicious. The service is also great and fast. Highly recommend for a mellow time.

name: Isaac sitton
text: This is a really nice place to get your pizza fix. I ordered a medium house special expecting a smaller 6 sliced pizza, but it filled me and my wife up. It was delicious, not too expensive for what you get, and great atmosphere. Would recommend.

name: kayla v
text: LOVE the build your own salad menu, vegan options and late night food

name: Ali M Ahmadi
text: Pretty good pitza

text: Good ambiance, affordable price and most importantly tasty food!

text: Good food, fast. Including a couple of nice vegan choices.

name: Marilyn Ritze

name: Jim Wolfe

name: √Ösa Rosenberg

text: A steak calzone so big, I couldn't eat it all. That was after having their delicious pretzel bites as an appetizer.

text: Was a very good pizza! I do not like pizza crust so much, but it did have the best pizza crust.

name: Serena v. Romero

text: Cool pizza place in Phoenix. The pizza is actually really good!

name: jacob staub
text:
Very cool pizza place on mill ave, the employees
are very friendly and the pizza was great! high quality ingredients and the pizza crust was purely artisan, it had that perfect crunch to softness ratio in the dough! It brought a smile to me and my fianc√©'s faces so it is a must if you visit phoenix!

name: Josie Steele
text: Let me start out saying we love mellow mushroom, our first visit to the Tempe location was on Thursday around 7:45. I ordered a small pepperoni pizza Togo, filled out my credit card receipt with $0 tip because I left cash. The next day I ‚Ä¶More

name: Kanisha Young
text: Amazing prices and the staff is more than helpful. They have a full bar and can make lots of drinks and also help with suggestions. Their happy hour is the best. Will definitely keep coming back.

name: Michael Rockett
text: They give the customer what they want...pizza on top of my BYO salad

name: Brandon Chow
text: It's mellow mushroom

text: Great pizza and service. They have a great beer selection.

name: James Mitchell
text: Great staff. They need parking for delivery orders though

name: Sharon Mays

name: Peter Bovaird
text: Great food. Family friendly vibe before it gets too lit around college students at night. Happy hour is special.

name: Robert LiKamWa
text: I've been happy with this place every time I've stopped in. Always greeted with friendly servers. The food has always been spot on (they even have gluten-free crusts, if your group has those needs) and the beer selection is wide.

name: Luis Mejiaortega
text: Came on a slow day but still got great service. Pizza is solid, and our waitress was friendly and attentive.

name: elia butterfly
text: Found a dead small cockroach in my to go order pizza box. I know it was from this place because it was underneath the pizza. I used to love this place, but now I‚Äôm disgusted. ‚Ä¶More

text: The place is ok. Ordered 10 pieces of wing's. Mild, and a 2 topping pizza. The wings was not what I expected. Pizza was good, not great. I also ordered ice tea. Finished drinking my tea. Took awhile for the waiter to get me a refill. I was ‚Ä¶More

name: Christopher Thomas
text: Didn't try the food just sat at the bar for a couple beers. Decent atmosphere. Service could've been better.

name: Vitaliy Demitri

name: New Elements by TCV
text:
Really good pizza!
We ordered a salad before the pizza and it was really good and the lemonade was amazing! Great place for the family or a big group.

name: Ash Skalniak
text: Went here for my birthday, totally worth it. Best I've had in a long time!! For sure one of my new grub spots!! Thx guys!!

name: Gabriel Gallegos
text: Didn't wait long and the waiter's were really polite.  The pizza was delicious and it didn't hurt my wallet either.

name: Ray Ray
text: Great place to grab late night food. Lots of great pizza options.

name: Emily M
text: Some of the best pizza I've ever had! They took a while to make the pizza but gave us 30% off for the wait. We were treated with great service. Would reccomend.

name: Antonio Ramirez
text: Food was average but the service was by far worse... only had 1 refill and never checked up on us; even when the salad was put in incorrectly... frustrating. By far better restaurants around ... the place even had a missing door handle ... wouldn‚Äôt have gave it 1 if the service wasn‚Äôt as bad as it was.

text: Good food, great location with knowledgeable staff. Great amount of draft beers

text: I really like the pretzels and wings lol

name: Justin DeRoy
text: Excellent food and service

name: Josette K. Esquivel
text: The Pizza & salad was Amazing, WE WILL definitely Eat there Again!! üòÅ

name: Edwin Gonzalez
text: Mellow is always a good spot to come to-- whether after a night out with the guys, punctuated by apps or a pizza, or as a place just to hang out and grab a bite and some drinks. I come here all the time, gotta love Mellow!

name: Webby Wonders: avicularia versicolor journey
text: Great pizza! Went here for lunch the pizza was awesome and the server was super nice!!

name: Guadalupe Gonzales
text: So good and cool at the same time.

name: Victoria Plato
text: Lunch specials are perfect size and perfect price.Service was excellent and very friendly.

name: Nico Hamilton
text: Fantastic pizza but the deserts were not very good.

name: Amanda Sloan
text: Great food and service.

name: Dolores Vela
text: This is the second time we've been to a Mellow Mushroom and we loved it. The prices are very reasonable and you can't beat a hand tossed just like you like it pizza.

name: Landis Owens
text: Great place for a salad-The Best Person Trainer

name: Roxy Marie
text: Delicious but definitely could have had more toppings for what you pay for a pizza. But very good.

name: Jeff Garner
text: Max was great. Modest beer selection but worthwhile if you go the 11% Backwoods Bastard route.  Superior service. Boom.

name: Darius Cherry

text: Love love LOVE this place! Great food, great drink menu, relaxing atmosphere and wonderful music. The staff is ON POINT!

name: Crystal Roberts
text: The waiter was very friendly and the food is always great!

name: Trina Feliciano

name: Chris Simpson
text: Food here was awesome! The atmosphere and service were also stellar. Highly recommend!

name: Ariana Valencia
text: Loved it. Bomb delicious food.  Fast and friendly.  Definitely recommend this place

name: Meg yogi
text: Delicious! Expensive, great gluten free options. The Postmates ordering muddles the order a bit:/

name: Subh Samal
text: I have given 5* for the food and the happy hour. But the staffs at the bars and food servers were rude.

name: Brian Nelson

name: Dan Hunt
text: Love the food. Their Happy Hour is amazing. Such good prices!

name: Sean
text: Reverse happy hour is the best here. You can get a pint for under five dollars. Also their appetizers are half off. With so many beers on tap, why wouldnt you come here.

name: Amy Clark
text: I won't order from here again. Each time I've ordered delivery something has been wrong or something I cant work with. This time my $19 cheese pizza is burnt to the point where I can only taste burnt crust, not their usual crust, and it's ‚Ä¶More

name: ty
text: These aren't the best pizzas, but I love them. After 10 pm they sell slices. Never disappointed by this place.

name: Tom Dalrymple
text: Good selection of local beers, better than Pedal Haus if you're looking for a decent meal and quality beer.

name: Paula Fosbinder
text: What an upbeat environment! Truly enjoyed everything from the art that greeted us sitting on the hostess stand to the delicious mushroom pizza and spinach artichoke dip.  The staff was excellent and full of smiles and energy.  This was my first time at this location. Love it and love the staff.  We will return! Great happy hour too.

name: Wizt
text: Music to damn load to even have a conversation but 5 star for the food

text: Pizza salad sandwich student style restaurant with nice booths and a clean environment. Salad is decent but uninspired. Wings were baked and pretty good.

name: Demetrius Henderson
text: Delicious

text: The atmosphere was really exquisite and the food here is amazing!

name: Joselyn Goodman

name: Scott Frisoni
text: Fantastic pizza and a great vibe.

name: Dana Feffer
text: LOVE the pretzel bites!

name: Jose Luis Rivera

text: Their pizza is BOMB! Great selection of beers and friendly staff.

name: cheri marshall
text: Good food, funky atmosphere,  service was lacking.

name: Jason Bennett
text: Low key to the max. Just think "Bartender in sweatpants" low-key.  They have A TON (30+) beers on tap. Download taphunter or Tappd to see which ones. Beer was cold, service was quick, nobody seemed bummed out. Didn't get food, will update review when I do.

text: Great pizza, good prices but the service was terrible...but at 11pm, what can you expect.

name: Stephen McDonough
text: We received incredibly slow service. We made it a point that we did not want tomatoes on our pizza. We received tomatoes on our pizza. In our party of 7, the server brought us 3 plates. As we were paying, the white server made a racist remark against my Native American girlfriend.  I will not be returning.

name: CEDDYCED
text: It was good, the pizza filled me up and the prices are reasonable

name: Al Jordan
text: I come here every weekend during their reverse happy hour. Half off drinks and some appetizers, and of course, GREAT pizza. My personal favorite is the buffalo chicken pizza. The bartenders Matt and Aaron are incredible.

name: Tim Trerise
text: Pizza! We showed up here in the middle of the afternoon after seeing a movie. It was very empty but very very nice. We then came back about 2 hours later and it was as crowded as could be! Recommended!

name: Kimberly Vogt

text: I tried some of the pizza options and it was really well made pizza! I loved the prompt service and the many vegan options

text: Pizza is solid but SUPER pricey. They have a great beer selection and the Mushroom soup was SO delicious.

text: Great atmosphere and good food!

name: Deidre McIlvaine
text: The service was excellent, we were there just after an ASU game so it was very crowded.  We ordered a plain cheese pizza, we're from Boston so we're very picky, not much in Arizona compares to Boston or NY style pizza.  What they lack in flavor they more than make up for in service, personally, and ambiance!

name: roger rodger
text: Clean bathroom, nice employees, good location, good pizza. Definitely recommend!

name: MJ Hollowwa
text: Pretty good. But kinda pricey.

name: Billy Krystal
text: Good food friendly staff

name: Miss Greenbean
text: Food was decent. Service was not.

name: Some One
text: Love our waiter! Great food, great place with friends or rolling solo.

name: Samuel Chadwick
text: Awesome pizza with even awesomer service.

name: Tawnya Kiehl
text: Really polite and "cool" staff (it's near the college, so they have to be cool!), decent service, and great food.  I enjoyed the selection, and the way that it's different.  You can sign up for their club on the website and get a free ‚Ä¶More

name: Ryan Przybylla
text: Food was mildly pricey, but delicious.

name: Natalie Warren
text: Loved this place!! Great food and service. We ordered two sandwiches, portobello and cheese as well as the avocado. Both were really good. Nice portions for the price. I also really liked the atmosphere; bar vibe with kid friendly seating areas.

name: Alex B
text: Good pizza but fantastic drink specials at night

name: Christian Leon
text: Pizza is delicious but beer was not cold. Service was a little on the slow side.

name: Jack Tripper
text: Great food ,good prices, good lighting and the bartenders are cool they are just busy as hell at night.

name: Andrew J. O'Keefe II
text: finally visited another mellow mushroom after years of only experiencing each coast ones. loved it. ‚Ä¶More

name: Luis Molero
text: Great pizzas and nice appetizers, perfect to grab a nice bite before or after a movie

name: Julie Lafaye
text: I enjoy lunch there from time to time when I'm shoe shopping at the Shoe Mill.

name: Austin Byrom
text: A nice change of pace from the usual antics of Mill Ave., Mellow offers some nice deals and tasty apps. Pop in late and it‚Äôs half off drinks and appetizers. The pretzels are delicious and you can‚Äôt go wrong with one of their cocktails.

name: Yvonne Guarente
text: Our first experience here was good.  Courtney was our server, she was very helpful and patient.  We ordered way too much but everything was good.  The buffalo chicken pizza was our favorite.  Happy hour was a bonus, will be back!

name: Krystal Inman
text: Amazing and cheap pizza by the slice after 10pm, excellent selection of craft brews on special during happy hour too!

name: Jeni Williams
text: The crust was nice and crispy. The veggies were fresh. Delicious pizza. Only reason I didn't give 5 stars is the price. Large pizza $30. If I didn't have a Groupon we wouldn't have gone.

name: Lori Weldon
text:
Their draft beer selection ROCKS!!
Had our server been half as amazing....

name: Queen Avery
text: Great pizza good atmosphere...a little pricey but worth it!

name: Shay Coco
text: Very good Pizza, amazing crust, and the vibe is okay. I would prefer a little more upbeat ambiance as well as customer service. When we received our pizza it seemed like it took forever to gt our check. Will eat there again, hopefully for happy hour.

name: Danielle Benally
text: Great pizza! Great beer selection.

name: tyco411
text: Decent pizza. Nothing stellar, but some cool creative taste options.

name: TJ McDonnell
text: We loved it!!!   We had the Holy Shiitake pie and it was outstanding.  We live in Los Angeles where a large percentage of servers are want to be actors and/or writers and often times are rude.  Dante was our server and we thought maybe he ‚Ä¶More

name: Alyssa Howell
text: A friend and I got there in time for happy hour, so the out-the-door price was on point.  The food was alright, but nothing amazing. Great place to go before a show at Gammage though.

name: Eden Garcia
text: Great beer selection and great pizza and wings!

name: Paul Ford
text: We ordered the mighty meaty pizza with thin crust.  This pizza is so good it's very flavorful and it's foldable with a crispy crust.  The staff are awesome very friendly and attentive.  I will definitely be coming back here again.

name: Stacie Lawrence
text: Great food great beer great service restrooms a little dirty

name: Brittany Lump
text: Buffalo pizza was so delicious. Good beer selection.

name: Rushil Anirudh
text: One of my favorite places on Mill! The 40 odd beers on the tap are the highlight and the happy hours after 10pm everyday, it doesn't get better than this! $3 for 16oz beers is a steal. The food's great and the service is excellent. I first ‚Ä¶More

name: Lon Ethridge
text: Never been disappointed at mellow mushroom. Always great service, huge selection of beer and super good pizza!

name: Scott Rafidi
text: Amazing pizza ! Great service !

name: Brown BearsTeacher
text: Has gluten and dairy free options.

name: Brooke Bundrick
text: We had great service and great food. They have lots of great options for people with all diets including vegan options). I ordered their vegan artichoke pizza and it was amazing, even my nonvegan friends loved it. Happy hour is great, too! 50% off after 10pm!

name: Allora Dworzanin
text: This location in my opinion is the best. The beer selection is just ah! Always better than the others. And the music late night a couple days of the week is usually country or oldies and everyone is so friendly. Very "local bar" vibe but better quality...I dig it:)

name: Diana Andrews
text: Amazing

name: In N Out
text: Meh pizza

name: L S
text: Delicious food and such a wonderful atmosphere. ^_^

name: Eren Suzer
text: The best Pizza place on Mill. American style pizza, goes really well with the ranch sauce you can order. Buffalo and BBQ chicken are my favorite pizzas of theirs. Their chicken wings and garlic bread are really good too!

name: Whitni Baker
text: Always great pizza and good beer selection.

name: Ty Scott
text: Mighty Meaty was incredibly and a large EASILY filled four people. Best pizza in the valley. ‚Ä¶More

name: Clarissa Sanchez
text: Always have amazing customer service and their food is amazing. Great happy hour deals. One of my favorite pizza places.

name: Shawn Haner
text: Terrible Service and when I finally got someone to talk to me and bring food out they were missing items.  Then wheI will not be back.

name: GoTeamScotch
text: Food was decent, wait time was pretty long, a little on the spendy side. Overall okay, but I probably won't be back.

name: Stephen King
text: A fun place for pizza.

name: Celeste Rodriguez
text: Ordered the red skin potato for pickup. I really liked it but there wasn't very much potato on it, like 7-10 slices. I figured the name of it meant it would mostly be covered with potatoes, but it wasn't. Other than that I enjoyed it.

name: Thomas Ortega
text: Good pizza n wings

name: Andrew Heinze
text: Beer is always cold and served with a smile.

name: Nicole Warren
text: Sometimes they good sometimes they not

name: Leandra Bailey
text: Great for both the bar and the restaurant! I ordered a huge slice of pizza and the best moscow mule I've ever had in my life! The staff are friendly and fun, our server Jackie was really awesome and made sure to take great care of us! A fun place to stop on Mill Ave!

name: Tyler Marx
text: Great sized Pizzas and Salad and the service is great!!

name: WILLIAM SANTEE
text: Awesome food and awesome service

name: kushal bhatt
text: We went here for dinner. I had heard great reviews about this place. But it was a huge disappointment. Food was just par. Service was terrible. My friend had to literally wave and call the waiter after waiting forever.

name: Dan Lepper
text: Try the calzone! My wife enjoys the vegan cheese in the calzone too!

name: Pandrew Lloyd
text: Hidden gem. Cheap beer awesome service. Bartenders are always super friendly and kitchen closes at 1!

name: Sonia Blanco
text: And who doesn't love half price happy hour appetizers?

name: Ricky Potts
text: I am a BIG fan of Mellow Mushroom. This location has a great beer selection and the pizza is amazing. Order the pretzels... You're welcome! If you are on Mill, and World of Beer just don't cut it, check out Mellow Mushroom for a pint of craft beer. They have a good happy hour, too. Cheers!

name: Jeff Miller
text: Awesome pizza, gf Crista available.

name: Jael Funte
text: Amazing pizza!

name: Agustin Romero

text: Went here with my girlfriend and she ended up eating shards of glass that chipped off her bowl into her dip. She then forced herself to vomit in the bathroom.

name: SM Stanis

name: Logan Cameron
text: Food is good. Happy hour is good. Staff is friendly. Decorations are fun. I like this place and I will continue to eat their pizza.

name: Joshua Harvey
text: This place is great! Open later than almost any place on mill any day on mill. The best beer tap options for a pizza restaurant and the staff is really great to the people. This place is an integral part of Tempe and should never leave!

name: Erica Delarosa
text: Foods great but service can take a bit.

name: Greg Roberts
text: Fantastic happy hour.

name: Michael Huskisson
text: This has got to be the absolute worst place to sit at a bar and eat in the country.   The bartender spent all her time chit chatting with the server while paying no attention at all to me  I even had to beg for a to go bag.  Do not I repeat do not ever go here if you are an adult and expect to be treated like so

name: David Feies
text: Really good pizza here.

name: Albert Freigruber
text: I had to wave down the 2 bartenders multiple times before getting my glass refilled and in the same glass too (which i guess that might be tempe) but the lady i was with, they completely ignored when she asked for a new drink as well. 0/5 ‚Ä¶More

name: Marguerite Sheehan
text: Perfect place to get a vegan calzone!

name: Paul Lesniak
text: Great Menu!

name: Bennett H

name: Yezen Jaber
text: The best pizza I've had in my life, one time they messed up our order of a large buffalo chicken pizza and instead gave us BBQ Chicken, instead of tossing it out they gave us the BBQ chicken free of charge and then later got the Buffalo ‚Ä¶More

name: Sky Duran
text: Been here only a couple of times. When I have been there, the service has always been good. Great place to go to spend time with friends, and great pizza.

name: Martha Chavez
text: Pizza is excelent and service is great

text: Great pizza!! So many choices including gf. Asked for blue cheese about 5 times,  got it about 30minutes later. Other than confused staff,  the food was great!!

name: Melinda Waite
text:
It was o.k
long wait barely busy.  Better pizza frozen

name: Nathaniel Geruson
text: Pizza is average quality. Management is disrespectful and shady. If you would like great pizza go else where. My 2 experiences with management regarding the wrong order being placed are exceptionally poor. They took my money and left me hanging. (For the manger on duty there will be more reviews coming ;).

name: Alicia Caldwell
text: Went with my husband and our two daughters who are three and 20 months. We got a large pizza and split it between two specialties. Pizza was amazing and my girls loved the pizza, even the shitake which surprised me. Great atmosphere, we lived the music.

name: Bridger Buck
text: This is my favorite pizza restaurant in Arizona. Their pizza is amazing and they make a really good Cesar salad.

name: Ashley Randall
text: Really loved the calzone I got. The waiter was funny and super helpful; he had some really strong opinions about the beer, gave us a couple of samples, and pointed us in the right direction. Would definitely go again for lunch.

name: H Salinas
text: I'm sure it's a great place but the guy that was at the door on 3/4/2016 didn't allow me and my friend to order even though we had 20mins til the restaurant closed. He claimed that we wanted to use the restroom  which some dudes before us did but he didn't even gave us a chance to explain. Not cool.

name: Dean Peterson
text: Great tasting pizza and very good service

name: Scott B
text: Let me thank the Mellow Mushroom in Tempe, Arizona for the absolute worst restaurant experience I‚Äôve had in years.  This was brought to us by the complete lack of management oversight and our ‚Äúserver‚Äù Sierra. We just walked out after 65 ‚Ä¶More

name: Karen Pele
text: Stopped by on a Wednesday, late afternoon.  Not a lot of people inside, and we were seated quickly.  Great pizza and everyone was friendly.  Cool selection of beer.

name: Andrew Colvin
text: I tried this place for the first time and it will definitely not be the last! The food was great and the waitress I has was wonderful and very helpful. My experience was great!

name: Dee McKenzie
text: Great food and service AND they have reverse happy hour with a killer selection of adult beverages. Great place to hang out with friends. Check them out!

name: Lucky Marcum
text: Great atmosphere. Very friendly

name: Jon Joy
text: Happy hour is legit. 20oz large glass for about $4. Their pizza is amazing and they come loaded with real toppings. Highly recommended for casual dates and even groups.

name: Jazmine Hardeman
text: My fav place to pregame and get margaritas during happy hour

name: Griffin Wiebel
text: Mellow Mushroom has good pizza, no doubt. However, when I received the bill, I almost choked on my last slice as I had not realized how expensive this place was. Yes, the service here was excellent and the seating and environment was good ‚Ä¶More

name: John Dawson
text: Fun place, good food and beer

name: Donna Wright
text: I love this place, their food is always fresh. People are friendly and the atmosphere is upbeat. Good pizzas and warm sandwiches.

name: Keith Baldwin
text: The pizza is unique and so good! Love the one with egg on it!! The decor of this location is a little odd for my tastes, but each location is different which makes it cool to try diff ones.

name: J R
text: Love coming here for an awesome meal!

name: Kaleigh Caraway
text: Happy hour is the best.

name: Carl Schager
text: Enjoyed the food, beer, and overall experience. Food prices were considerably higher than expected. Might be a better value during happy hour.

name: McKenzie Wilkins
text: This place kind of looks like a disco, and I'm tellin ya - it's a destiny location under certain circumstances. Which are: you're already drunk and SO hungry, not quite ready for bed, but wanna end the bar crawl stuffing your face. With ‚Ä¶More

text: Great pregame place, best Long Island iced teas on Mill.

name: Tony Martinez
text: Great place.  Food beer selection waa outstanding.  The view at night is very nice.  Family friendly.  Must visit if in town.

name: Lisa Casanova
text: Amazing Food and awesome location on Mill.  They have an outdoor patio that is great for people watching on the weekends and a fun spot for lunch during the week.  Billy, who is the manager, is always on the floor right next to his staff ‚Ä¶More

text: Best Happy Hour Hands down. Great location and plays good music. Perfect after late night chill spot. Munchie menu and pizza is awesome

name: weesteelee33

name: Brooke B

name: Brian Offenberger
text: Loved the mushroom soup and wings.

text: Great veggie pizza options, nice to see tofu too! The staff were polite, courteous and attentive. The food was fresh and good.....thoroughly recommended!

name: Michael Billingsley
text: Had a great side salad and excellent meatball app.  Very good atmosphere.

name: signory C44
text: Great portions

name: Pablo Plata
text: Wasn't a huge fan. Second time here. Pizza tastes good but it's wayyyy too expensive for what you get in return. We got a large specialty pizza. It was 24.99$ and it was all dough and barely any toppings. Some of the slices were missing toppings.  Good atmosphere but pizza is not anything special especially for the price.

name: Montana Fox
text: 1st time visit, we got the Caesar salad pizza. Very good, even if it was a tad difficult to eat like a normal pizza. Also a good wide variety of beers on tap as well as in bottles/cans. Menu has lots of things I want to try in the future.

name: Thana Aquilah
text: Amazing pizza. One patron was super rude bartender corrected her in a kind way! Appreciated that.

name: Gregory Wheeler
text: As the creator and owner of Mellow Pizza I appreciate the feedback thanks

name: Madonna Mawhinney

name: Vanessa Montoya
text: The staff were very attentive and the pizza was so fresh and crisp. It's a lifesaver at 11:50pm when coming back from a concert since it's open until 2 am!!

name: Abhishek Dharan
text: One of the most deliciously distinctive pizzas around ASU. If you have dinner  here it could be a bit pricey for college students but definitely worth it. The atmosphere could not be more welcoming either. Overall one of my favorite pizza places around Tempe if I want a nice sit down restaurant.

name: mark phoenix
text: Good pizza

name: Byron preuss
text: Nice place but pizza was bland and very salty.

name: darktemplar1455
text: Went to a Sunday dinner ordered a spec pizza. went to wash hands no soap in bathrooms. After waiting for the staff to not fix it, we began to eat our pizza to find it burnt to hell on bottom.

name: Conrad M
text: Server got our order wrong than offered to discount our check but never did. Regardless the food more than made up for it. Absolutely love this pizza!

name: Harsh V.

name: Heather Burno

text: Solid mellow mushroom. Located in downtown Tempe, there are local variants which I always try if available. Great vibe, chill atmosphere and great piza as always. Extended beer selection as well!

name: C Curtis

name: Rebecca S

name: Pat

name: Jason F

text: I went to the Mellow Mushroom for happy hour with my friends and had some of the best food I have had anywhere.  The stuffed Portobello mushroom and three meatball platter was so divinely delicious,  the food literally melted in your mouth. ‚Ä¶More

text: I'm from Georgia, so I've been to the original Atlanta store, the Statesboro store ,the Savannah store even the Hilton Head store, and this by far is the worst as far as service goes. The servers act as if they're too cool to be working there. Pushy and unhelpful!

name: Sarah Riggins
text: My husband and I went to Mellow Mushroom on Mill for the 2nd time using a Groupon, and brought our 19 month old daughter. She didn't want to sit in the highchair, and it was challenging to enjoy our dinner while wrangling our toddler. The ‚Ä¶More

name: Meghan Caldron

name: Geoff Henderson
text: Loved this place!
